name: sqljson-query
description: Command line tool to generate SQL/JSON queries and Typescript types for query results.
author: Stephen C. Harris

scripts.start-pg-test-db: npm run build-pg-test-db && docker run -d --name drugs-pg --rm -p 127.0.0.1:5432:5432 --shm-size=256MB drugs-pg
scripts.start-mysql-test-db: npm run build-mysql-test-db && docker run -d --name drugs-mysql -p 127.0.0.1:3306:3306 drugs-mysql
scripts.gen-dbmd-json-schema: mkdirp lib/schemas && typescript-json-schema --refs --required --strictNullChecks -o lib/schemas/dbmd.schema.json tsconfig.json DatabaseMetadataStoredProperties
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run gen-dbmd-json-schema
